Initializer# init(mtlCommandQueue:options:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    mtlCommandQueue commandQueue: any MTLCommandQueue,
    options: [CIContextOption : Any]? = nil
)
```
